snippet: In forms filed this week in preparation for his campaign for a United States Senate seat, Mayor Cory A. Booker reported being paid $1,327,190 for 96 speeches since 2008.
abstract: Newark Mayor Cory A Booker, now a Senate candidate, reports that he earned $1.3 million in speaking fees over the last four and a half years; says he paid $476,156 in taxes and donated $619,253 to charity.
lead_paragraph: In forms filed this week in preparation for his campaign for a United States Senate seat, Mayor Cory A. Booker reported being paid $1,327,190 for 96 speeches since 2008.

headline.seo: Cory Booker, Newark Mayor, Reports $1.3 Million in Speaking Fees
headline.main: Newark Mayor Discloses $1.3 Million in Speaking Fees
headline.print_headline: Newark Mayor Discloses $1.3 Million in Speaking Fees
